page.title: 19THE IRONBRIDGE BY-PASS
page.content: There is going to be a by-pass built around Ironbridge. The by-pass starts at the roundabout at Aqueduct, by- passing Ironbridge to come out at Buildwas and join the Shrewsbury road. There is going to be a car park built off the by-pass so that the tourists will have somewhere to park. From the car park the tourists will be able to catch a coach to anywhere in Ironbridge or Coalbrookdale free of charge. The by-pass is being built because of all the traffic that goes through Ironbridge, so that when the by-pass is built all the lorries will not have to go through Ironbridge. The roads in Ironbridge were too weak to carry all the traffic; the pavements are too narrow for people to be safe.
